delete.title: Confirm Delete
delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete this task?

q1.question: How do I create a new task?
q1.answer: Click the 'Add New Task' button, enter task details, select a category, and click 'Create Task'.

q2.question: Can I edit or delete tasks?
q2.answer: Yes, each task has edit and delete buttons. Click edit to modify task details or delete to remove it.

q3.question: Are my tasks saved?
q3.answer: Yes, your tasks are automatically saved in your browser's local storage. They will persist even if you close and reopen the browser.
